text: Failing that, it should be checked against a flat-faced shield.13. Bolts:a. 2.5″ (6.35 cm) templateb. Two full fletchingsc. Stable head, no wobbled. Check for no metal or tape under open celle. Shaft not cracked, bent, or splitf. Nock not broken. May not use pinching, arrow-style nocks.g. Maximum shaft length of 18”. This may not be met with a draw stop.h. Check that a modular bolt head is firmly attached to the shaft and cannot twist out.i. Check for any shifting sounds or clicking that may indicate that the foam is separating from the blunt.j. Hit testing at 10′ (3.05 m)i. Use a crossbow that produces as close to 450 in-lb as possible. You may wish to ask the crossbow owner to fire the bolts. Testing back cannot see the bolts.
